data.md:MetaData: Lithology of sediment core CRENO2, Lac de Creno, France
Lake. Physiography: glacial origin. Surrounding vegetation: Pinus laricio. Local vegetation: hygrophilous herb and Sphagnum. Location: border north of the lake. Core diameter: 8 cm
Contribution Pollenanalytique à l'histoire Tardiglaciaire et Holocène de la Végétation de la Montagne Corse
